page.title: 13HACKLINGE AREA COMMUNICATION
page.content:
{Communications. 90% of households have a telephone and there are 4 public telephone boxes. There are 4 post boxes which are emp- tied twice daily and post is delivered twice daily except on Sundays.
{Information. The Mobile Library visits Worth and Finglesham once a week.
{Law and Order. The area is policed by the Thanet Div- ision Kent Police. The station at Bur- gess Green has been closed about a year but was used during the 1984-5 pit strike to house visiting police- men. The cover is adequate as there is little or no crime or vandalism, but most people would like to see the 'Village Bobby' back again in the community.
